Title: Establishes mandatory minimum medicaid coverage for hospital confinement for childbirth
Summary: Requires all insurance policies and health maintenance organization contracts to provide coverage for maternity patients and their newborns for hospital stays of at least 48 hours following childbirth by natural delivery and 96 hours following childbirth by caesarean section; provides similar coverage for patients who are recipients of medicaid.
LawCode: Amd ยง365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing mandatory minimum medicaid coverage for hospital confinement for childbirth
